# id

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier in this bug’s associated bug-tracking system, if available.

## Declaration

```swift
var id: String?
```

## Discussion

For more information on how the testing library interprets bug identifiers, see [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/BugIdentifiers].
title: id
